2. TvB Cooperation
The Television Advertising Bureau has been working with
us in helping keep all television stations informed of the
work of the Youth Opportunity Council and your participation.
This has been in the form of a story on the advertising industry's
Youth Opportunity activity in the TvB bulletin, and a letter
to every television station in the country. A personal P.S.
from Pete Cash, president of the TvB, was added to each letter
sent to each television station in the 50 major cities. Pete's
note went to all stations in each major market, whe.ther a
member of the Bureau or not.
